item.title: glogg - the fast, smart log explore
item.description: Glogg is a tool to browse and search through text files. I find it very useful to search in log files, it’s light and fast. It can also “follow” a file, so there’s no need to reopen the file or refresh if something changes. You can download glogg for Linux or Windows HERE
